name: Ali Jassim Al-Basri
skills_sentences: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics monitoring and response
alienvault unified security management for asset and vulnerability management
antivirus console management including Kaspersky and FortiClient
computer forensics and network intrusion analysis
firewall configuration and management including Fortinet
secure routing and switching with DHCP snooping, port security, and ARP inspection

security frameworks based on Network Access Control-Elliptic Curve Cryptography, National Institute of Standards and Technology, International Organization for Standardization, Saudi Arabian Monetary Authority, and Saudi Arabian Cybersecurity Standards
responsibility_sentences: develop and deliver cybersecurity training and awareness programs to employees
align organizational operational goals with security functions and implementations
analyze, troubleshoot, and investigate information security incidents using multiple reporting platforms
conduct security and risk assessments to identify vulnerabilities and mitigate risks
design, implement, and manage security tools and systems including virtual private networks, data loss prevention, and firewalls
develop and implement company cybersecurity strategy aligned with business objectives
implement and manage security tools such as security information and event management, intrusion detection and prevention systems, and vulnerability scanners
manage cybersecurity team and collaborate with cross-functional departments for policy compliance
manage incident response activities and coordinate team responses to security incidents
protect organizational assets throughout their lifecycle using physical and logical access controls
